```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(anomalize)
library(tibbletime)
library(forecast)
```

```{r}
er_wait_times <- read_csv("waittimes_record.csv")
```


```{r}
er_wait_times %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = read_timestamp, y = total_minutes)) + 
  geom_point() +
  #geom_line(aes(color = hospital_webpage)) + 
  theme_minimal() +
  geom_smooth() + 
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```
